Open 7 days a week, we supply a huge range of pharmaceutical goods and herbal medicines throughout Medowie. Our conveniently located pharmacy offers a variety of services available to the general public including, mobility aids, diabetes NDSS, natural therapies and we even have an in-house qualified herbalist available. Want to check the health of your little one? We have baby health services available throughout the week. You can also get all of your vitamins, cholesterol testing and blood pressure monitoring done at Medowie Pharmacy. Can't make it in for your regular prescription pick-up? We have free local delivery available—call us to find out more. For all your diabetes and asthma supplies in Port Stephens, contact Medowie Pharmacy. Book Your Covid - 19 Vaccination Today We Currently now stock the latest Pfizer Omicron BA45 Vaccination Organise your COVID-19 appointment today by simply calling up or click the link below to book your appointment. It is important to ensure you are eligible for the vaccine. If you are unsure, please use the [eligibility checker here](https://covid-vaccine.healthdirect.gov.au/eligibility?lang=en) prior to booking your appointment. New Eligibility for booster dose. Everyone over 18 can have another booster as long as it has been at least 6 months since their last dose and 6 months since they have had a Covid-19 infection. Currently we only offer booster vaccinations for those 12 years and over. If you haven't been vaccinated at all please contact the pharmacy to discuss. Immunisation We now provide Flu Vaccination and COVID-19 Vaccinations please refer to our booking section to arrange your appointments. NDSS - National Diabetes Services Scheme Home Delivery Can't get to us? No problems, we will come to you! If you would like your medicines delivered please just call the pharmacy. Absence from Work Certificates If you are too sick to go to work and can't get into your doctor, we can provide you with a 1 or 2 day absence from work certificate. Consumer Medicines Information Medicines can be confusing. Our pharmacists are experts in medicines advice, especially when it is a new medicine. We can help get you started with your medicines and even if you've been on them for a while - we'll provide you with printed medicines information - best of all it's FREE! Heart Health Checks Our pharmacist can help you spot the signs of an unhealthy heart, using this comprehensive 9 point check. They will also advise you on any further action you may need to take, and inform you about simple lifestyle changes you can make, to improve your heart health.
